channel.title: Adding Custom Shop
channel.description:
Hi,
How do I add a custom shop (I want to add a Rare's shop) to my PI source, but IDK how.
I have put my NPC that I want to use for the Shop in my Staff Zone, but IDK what to do to make him a shop.
The NPC I am using for the Rare's Shop is Miles.
NPC ID = 2537 is Miles
I am wanting to add Partyhats, Masks, Santa hats, Primal, etc, into the shop...
How do I do this...? :confused:

item.title: Adding Custom Shop
item.dc:creator: @strd3stroyer strd3stroyer
item.description:
@strd3stroyer wrote:

I changed the link, I don’t know why it was on the other 1…

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Custom Shop
item.dc:creator: @Anc13ntsIsBack Anc13ntsIsBack
item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

Open up your ActionHandler.java

Search

You will see,

right underneath that add…

case 2537: c.getShops().openShop(54); break

Now go to your Shops.cfg

Add this…

Replace the ID’s with which items you want added in. ID’s = 15038, 15051, 15042, 15043, the “100” is the amount of that item.

Read full topic
